branchCategory.name: High Holding Force - MHS
branchCategory.description: <p>Gripper series&nbsp;MHS utilizes a wedge cam design to minimize their overall size while retaining a high holding force.</p>

branchItem.name: MHS3, Air Gripper, 3 Finger, Parallel Style
MHSL3, Air Gripper, 3 Finger, Long Stroke (Bore 16~25)
branchItem.description: <p> The MHSL3 Series, the long stroke, 3-finger grippers are optimal for gripping a wide diameter range of spherical, cylindrical or round work pieces and loading or unloading of work pieces from the chuck of a machine tool. Its wedge cam design minimizes its overall size while retaining a high holding force making it suitable for end-of-arm (end effector) or space constrained pick and place applications.</p>

branchItem.name: MHSL3, Air Gripper, 3 Finger, Long Stroke (Bore 32~125)
branchItem.description: <p>The MHSL3 Series, the long stroke, 3-finger grippers are optimal for gripping a wide diameter range of spherical, cylindrical or round work pieces and loading or unloading of work pieces from the chuck of a machine tool. Its wedge cam design minimizes its overall size while retaining a high holding force making it suitable for end-of-arm (end effector) or space constrained pick and place applications.</p>

branchItem.name: MHSJ3, Air Gripper, 3 Finger, w/Dust Cover
branchItem.description: <p>The MHSJ3 Series, 3-finger grippers adds a dust cover to protect from the work environment. These are optimal for gripping spherical, cylindrical or round work pieces and loading or unloading of work pieces from the chuck of a machine tool. Its wedge cam design minimizes its overall size while retaining a high holding force making it suitable for end-of-arm (end effector) or space constrained pick and place applications. </p>

branchItem.name: MHSH3, Air Gripper, Through Hole Type
branchItem.description: <p>The MHSH3 Series, 3-finger grippers adds a center through-hole to accommodate a push actuator to ensure proper release of work pieces. These are optimal for gripping spherical, cylindrical or round work pieces and loading or unloading of work pieces from the chuck of a machine tool. Its wedge cam design minimizes its overall size while retaining a high holding force making it suitable for end-of-arm (end effector) or space constrained pick and place applications. </p>

branchItem.name: MHSHJ3, Air Gripper, Through Hole, w/Dust Cover
MHSH3-A, Center Pusher Assembly
branchItem.description: <p>Center pusher assembly for series MHSH3 and MHSHJ3. This is mounted directly to the back of the gripper and includes all necessary hardware.</p>
